title: Collaborative Process Design for Strengthening Simulation-Based Nursing Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment utilizing VR-based simulation tools in a limited-technology setting centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can perform 10 core nursing procedures (e.g., intravenous injection, patient transfer) with over 80% accuracy via VR simulation
Application of a four-stage decision-making process in emergency simulation scenarios to select appropriate interventions through collaborative problem-solving
Achievement of 75+ points (out of 100) on summative assessments utilizing digital evaluation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
